title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Special Lecture on Remote Education Satisfaction and Perception Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic instructional methodologies and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Identify at least three core elements for designing a remote education satisfaction measurement tool.
Analyze at least five opportunities and challenges of remote education from the perspectives of learners and instructors.
Develop ten survey questions applying the UTAUT (Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology) framework.
Submit a project report comparing differences in perceptions of remote education among small groups.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
